instruction: Identify at least three components of a standard computer system.
output: A standard computer system typically consists of a processor, memory, storage, and input/output components. The processor is typically a central processing unit (CPU) which processes data. Memory is used to store data and instructions. Storage is often made up of a hard disk drive or solid state drive which contain programs and data. Input/Output components are used to transfer data and commands to/from the system, typically including a keyboard, mouse, monitor, and other peripherals.
